projects.name: E.L.E. Extinction Level Elephant (Canceled)
projects.blurb: As a colossal elephant orbiting the Earth, you must partake in a doomed game of cosmic blow football and guide the planet to safety.

projects.name: Dukes of War: A unique turn-based strategy game (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Reviving the gaming fun of turn-based strategy classics in a exciting new experience on iOS and Android!

projects.name: Epoch: Return (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Explore an unknown alien world to discover its secrets. Salvage the remains of crashed ships to repair your own ship and return home.

projects.name: World Agent BRAC - The Game To End Poverty (Canceled)
projects.blurb: WORLD AGENT BRAC is a unique game where players can have fun building a community and contributing to the real world poverty issue.

projects.name: Age of Ascent (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Age of Ascent is a new space MMO that lets thousands of people play together in realtime in the same battle.

projects.name: Galaxy Gang Wars (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Massively Multiplayer Online game that's set in a galactic warzone. A splendid mixture of Star Wars and Killzone that you'll love!

projects.name: JetGetters - Hijack Jets Midair (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Fly high in the sky and hijack other players' vehicles mid-air. A fighter hi-jacking game from the creators of No Time To Explain.

projects.name: The Survival Games (Canceled)
projects.blurb: The Survival Games - A multiplayer survival combat game featuring archaic weaponry, natural disasters and ever-changing environments.

projects.name: ZOMBIES ON A PLANE (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Fight to stay in the air as passengers turn to zombies in this nonstop joyride at 30,000ft.

projects.name: Arrelia: The Indie Fantasy RPG (Canceled)
projects.blurb: A 2d turn-based rpg reminiscent of the classic rpg games such as Final Fantasy, Lunar, and Suikoden.

projects.name: Tinker 3 Part Perspective Series (Canceled)
projects.blurb: 2D Point n Click Puzzle Game. 3 Part Perspective Series featuring Voice acting and 3 main Characters all inhabiting one story timeline.

projects.name: Farming Sim! -> 4 Player Sandbox Action/Adventure/RPG/Sim
projects.blurb: Open World Farming Sim where you can build anything, anywhere and craft everything. Players are free to customize and play their way.

projects.name: Dream of Stars: A Heartwarming Sci-fi Visual Novel!
projects.blurb: A dedicated 3-person studio seeks to create a cute and memorable choose-your-own-adventure game.

projects.name: Fall Schematic (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Reclaim the physical and digital halves of a disintegrating world in this cooperative tabletop card game and digital RPG.

projects.name: Super Adventure Mega Quest (Canceled)
projects.blurb: The first game to have perfect platforming controls on the touch screen, and graphics from every video game generation combined!

projects.name: Rockets Club - Create! Race! Explore! (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Create your own world! Design your own rocket ships, race against friends or just hang out! In this multi genre epic adventure!

projects.name: A Postponed Project (Canceled)
projects.blurb: This project has been postponed until further notice.

projects.name: Help the kids open a Gaming Center in a small town
projects.blurb: Help start a Gaming Center for the local kids in a small town Where kids have a place to have fun and learn about games & technology

projects.name: The Happy Tree Project -  a digital game for kids by kids
projects.blurb: How do you turn a frown upside down? Youngsters want to make their own video game with grown ups to spread happiness to kids worldwide.

creator.name: Julia Bateson on behalf of Excite-ed CIC

projects.name: Johnny Reboot - And The Legendary Upgrade (Canceled)
projects.blurb: Battle agoraphobia as you explore a vast cyber world in this Metroidvanian Brawler!
